MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting Mavisbank Terrace and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.52am. Our engineers have arrived at Floors street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.25am on 26th October 2020.
